Question
========
  
A randomly selected sample of 560 people filled in a questionnaire about their attitude towards online shopping.  A total of 345 participants indicated to be positive towards online shopping, whereas the others were negative.  Calculate, based on this sample, the 90% confidence interval of the proportion persons that have a positive attitude towards online shopping.

  
Answerlist
----------
* (.344 , .424)
* (.576 , .656)
* (.582 , .650)
* (.591 , .641)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
